experience.description: I was working as an agent assisting customers with any quiries regarding their PEP money transfers, PAXI parcel tracking and doing follow ups.
I was a picker and a packer scanning items and doing dispatch in two departments, dry-goods and perishables
This was an in-service training job I got through my college to help me gain experiance as an Operations Manager.

testimonials.message: Working with Ayabulela was an incredible experience. Their professionalism, attention to detail, and communication skills made the entire process seamless. They consistently exceeded my expectations and delivered exceptional results. I would highly recommend him to anyone looking for a talented and dedicated professional.

Ayabulela is a rising star in the software development world! His passion for coding and eagerness to learn is truly inspiring. I have no doubt that he will become a great developer and contribute positively to the tech industry
I have known Ayabulela for a short time but I have discovered that he is very down to earth and approachable. He is extremely hard-working and has good collaboration skills when working on projects

Ayabulela is is seen as a very dedicated person, always ready to take on any challenge that is put in front of him. Always ready to lend a helping hand in class or the workplace. He is very resourceful and can figure almost any problem and he has shown this capability countless times in the workplace and projects that were handed to him.

Ayabulela is a very great person he works well in a team and also works really hard , and he is always punctual. He has a good understanding of IT and web development, he would be a great asset to your team and a very reliable team member. Any team would be lucky if you were to accept him.
